channel.title: Mission Box feedback
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mission Box feedback"

item.title: Re: Mission Box feedback
item.content:encoded:
Now this pages are gone: ninboxspecial, genboxspecial, taiboxspecial. They became redundant with my last change.
In special missions use this:

 |rank=@@

This has the effect of hiding the rank on the missionbox.
This is to be used with the regular mission boxes.

item.title: Mission Box feedback
item.content:encoded:
When I edited them I was using Opera. It seems there is a difference in the width when using operas on the dual ability boxes. And I think the border width might be to large. Tell me what you think about them and what I should change.

L.E.: I have fixed the Firefox dislplay on dual ability boxes.
